name: Share Photo Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
You will have a lot of fun with this app!

Take a photo, create a Puzzle, solve it. You like it, save it for later use.

Share the Puzzle with other, a very nice way to bring your Photo Puzzle to others, sharing not only the photo, but also the fun to solve it.

Settings allow to show the original photo and the Puzzle grid as background, making it easier to solve the Puzzle.

Very clean and easy to use interface.
